augmentsTip: Very powerful with a wide variety of Artifacts. Shaco is a snowball carry so only play from spots you are very likely to hit quickly. Shaco does not stack permanent AD on PvE rounds. Darius has built-in Sunder. If your Shaco has range extension, do NOT make him the Kingpin. Board caps with Renekton or Garen.

tips.tip: Focus on getting permanent AD stacks on Shaco. Slam items as you get them while stacking econ. You likely won't lose streak fully but it's okay if you gain stacks.
If you are close to Shaco (6+ copies), hyper roll at Stage 3-1 / Level 4 for Shaco 3. Otherwise, slow roll boave 50g for Shaco.
Push levels for Slayers. Zed / Senna takes leftover AD items. If you get Syndicate emblem, play on Zed and play 5 Syndicate.

title: Mad Hatter

augmentsTip: Play when you have lots of copies of Veigar with tears and early Nitro. Your Robot upgrades to a Dinosaur at 200 stacks. Give leftover items to Cyberboss units or Elise.

tips.tip: Prioritize stacking your Nitro Robot ASAP with Veigar. Prioritize Veigar items. Focus on econ.
Level to 6 on 3-2 and roll for at least Veigar 2 and Shyvana 2. You can play Elise on 6 or another frontline unit. Slow roll above 50g for Veigar 3.
Level for more Cyberboss. Kobuko spikes your board immensely. Itemize your Cyberbosses or if you have lots of gold, you can go for Elise 3.

title: Nitro Veigar

augmentsTip: Alternative Cyberboss board you can Fast 9 with if you cannot commit to reroll Veigar. Win condition: Itemized Kobuko 2, Brand 2, and leftover AP on Ziggs/Viego. Max cap can flex in Renekton and Garen over Ekko and Neeko.

tips.tip: Play strongest board around a winstreak AP opener featuring Veigar. Slam AP items aggressively because true BIS in this comp is fake.
Level to 8 and stabilize around Brand, Ziggs, and Street Demon / Strategist board. Look for 3 costs to stabilize frontline such as Gragas and Mordekaiser.
Fast 9 and search for Kobuko and Viego to cap your board. Ziggs can hold carry items but often holds utility / leftover items.

title: Cyberboss Fast 9

augmentsTip: Ideally played from high tempo / high econ positions. If you have emblem, get to 6 Golden Ox ASAP to start farming components. You can only trigger Golden Ox once per turn so it may be worth at times to lose 1-2 interest gold that round to pump stacks. Garen mod Golden Ox everyone for max cap.

tips.tip: Slam items aggressively and play around Graves as the primary item holder. The first interval for Golden Ox that is clean is 2-5 double level to 5.
If you are very rich, consider pre-leveling to 6 for a Golden Ox trigger. If you have emblem, look for 4 Golden Ox. Roll some if you have impactful pairs.
If you are very rich, consider pre-leveling to 8 over 2 turns for Golden Ox triggers. Roll for Aphelios and 6 Ox Force ASAP. Go 9 for Viego and 5 costs.

title: Golden Ox Force

augmentsTip: Play when you can get early Elise, Braum is uncontested, and have econ to look for Braum 3 / Elise 3. Leftover AD on Miss Fortune. Leftover AP on Aurora. 4 Dynamo Aurora caps the board.

tips.tip: Play a strong winstreak AP opener, preferably around Morgana and Dynamo. Can also slam AD items for MF later.
Level to 6 and maintain winstreak. Roll if you have 3+ impactful pairs. Consider taking an econ augment if you haven't already.
Level to 7 and slight roll for Elise 2 and Braum 2. Econ up then go to level 8 and roll for the board. Once you hit Elise 3, go 9 for Aurora / 4 Dynamo.

title: Dynamo Elise Braum

augmentsTip: Prioritize true tank items on Leona instead of utility. 10 Anima Squad will win most games, but requires 2 emblems / 10 team size. Weapon scales off star level so sometimes holding random 3* units can be clutch (Illaoi, Vayne, Sylas).

tips.tip: Open with upgraded 3 Anima Squad and winstreak. Stack Seraphine 2 / Sylas 2. Weapon: uWu Blasters > Guiding Hex / Blade-o-rang.
Level for 5 Anima Squad and upgraded frontline. Look for a good item or combat augment. Weapon: Animines > Vortex / Searing
Get to level 8 and find 7 Anima Squad. Stabilize around Xayah 2 and Leona 2 before getting to level 9. Go 9 for 5 costs. Weapon: Gatling = Tornadoes > Annihlator.

title: Anima Squad

augmentsTip: Best on high item encounters + item augment start. You can check Team Planner to check Exotech items before you commit to an augment. Leftover AD on Jhin, leftover AP on Varus/Aurora. Exo mod on Garen for a 3rd item is highest cap.

tips.tip: Ideally take item augments early to finish 3 item quickly and get Exotech value. Play around early Jhin and Exotech.
Level for 5 Exotech and Bastions. You should have full 3 items on a frontline and a backline unit. Econ up for Fast 8.
Fast 8 @ 4-2 and look for Zeri, Sejuani, and 7 exotech, without emblem, play aggressive to look for top 4, with emblem, maybe greed for 5 costs if hp allows.

title: Exotech Zeri

augmentsTip: Street Demon positioning changes every game so adjust accordingly. Zyra / Strategist holds items for Brand. Jinx holds for Samira. Ziggs / Kobuko spots are flexible.

tips.tip: Play around your upgraded Street Demons. Slam your items aggressively and play for winstreak.
Level and add more Street Demons. You can flex in other traits like Strategists, AMP, and Techies. Econ up.
Level to 8 and roll down for Brand, Neeko, and 7 Street Demon. Play around any upgraded duo carry for Brand. Once stable, go to 9 for 5 costs.

title: Streetagists

augmentsTip: 4 Vanguard is the standard frontline but you can flex in other units if you are contested such as Bruisers, Bastions, Zac, etc. Leona wants 3 true tank items (not Sunfire / Evenshroud). Aphelios and Xayah can same side late game to snipe enemy corner carries.

tips.tip: Play a strong tempo opener around Rageblade and Vanguard opener while econning up.
Level for 4 Vanguard + any backline duo carry that can play Rageblade. 2 Slayers (Vayne), 2 Marksman (Jhin/Jinx), or 2 Rapidfire (TF).
Fast 8 and look for 4 Marksman and 4 Vanguard. Jinx 2 can hold items temporarily if you are struggling to upgrade your 4 costs. Go 9 for Aurora or Zac.

title: 4/4 Marksman Vanguard

augmentsTip: Play when you have early Executioners or powerful Artifacts for Rengar (listed in Alt Builds). Varus 3 / Vex take leftover AP items.

tips.tip: Play around Graves and Golden Ox early to winstreak while making econ. Graves can hold pretty much any melee or tank item.
Level to 6 for more Executioner and relevant traits around your frontline. If you still don't have Graves 2, roll a few times to upgrade him.
Level to 7 to roll for upgrades and 4 Executioner. Econ back up and slow roll for 3* Varus and Rengar. If you are very rich with extra items, you can chase Graves 3.

title: Executioner Reroll

augmentsTip: Always play 5 AMP when possible. Play when you have econ and can get lots of tears. Positioning will change every game pending on the Street Demon hexes. Leftover AD on Samira, leftover Mana / Utility / AP on Annie.

tips.tip: Either play around a strong winstreak AP early game (Example: Techies and Bastions) or lose streak with Cypher / Open Fort
If winstreaking, add other relevant traits, such as Strategists, Street Demons, or more Techies. If lose streaking, cash out Cypher at 3-7.
Level to 8 and look for Yuumi 2 and Annie 2. Don't overoll because we need to get to Level 9 / Samira. If you are stuck on 8, chase Yuumi 3.

title: Strategist AMP

augmentsTip: Play with strong combat scaling augments so Kogmaw and Vanguards can compete in the late game. MR Shred is useful for Boom Bot magic damage. Garen with Vanguard mod caps the board. 3* Priority: Kogmaw > Vi > Skarner >> Sylas >>> Rhaast / Kindred.

tips.tip: Collect Kogmaw and Vanguards while focusing on econ. Prioritize Kogmaw items on first carousel.
Roll above 50g for Kogmaw 3, Skarner, and other Vanguards. Every 3* Vanguard besides Skarner is luxury so only chase if rich / hitting quickly.
Finish upgrading your board then push levels for 6 Vanguards. Rapidfire duo carry holds leftover offensive items.

title: Kog-Guards

augmentsTip: Play from early copies of TF and Rageblade components. Roll for this composition on level 7. Leftover carry items on Draven. Late game either Kingpin frontline or MF 2 with items.

tips.tip: Play early Rapidfire Vanguard for tempo and prioritize Twisted Fate items. Kogmaw 2 is better than Twisted Fate 1 early.
Level up and roll for TF 2, 3 Syndicate, and upgraded fr ontline. Make TF your Syndicate Kingpin. Econ up back to 50g.
Level to 7 and slow roll above 50 for TF, Draven, and frontline 3*. Avoid pushing levels until you 3* a tank. Add Gragas or frontline / 5 cost / Bruiser at 8.

title: Card Shark

augmentsTip: Ideally played from Flickerblade artifact. You can play this from either a tempo winstreak opener or a Cypher cashout. Zeri's best Exotech items are Pulse Stabilizer or Flux Capacitor. If you are very rich, you can chase Draven 3 as a duo carry.

tips.tip: Play from winstreak when you have early Rageblade and upgrades. If you are playing lose streak, look for Cypher units in shop + on carousel.
Level up for 4 Bastion and backline. Jhin 2 is the ideal item holder. If Cypher streak, maintain lose streak at least until 3-7.
Fast 8 and roll for Zeri, Sejuani and 6 Bastion. Once stable, go to level 9 for Garen. Leftover items on Renekton.

title: Bastion Zeri

augmentsTip: Positioning will change each game depending on the Street Demon hexes. Fiddle has built in 20% Shred but you still want anti-MR items. Emblem can be on Neeko until you hit Kobuko.

tips.tip: Look for a strong AP opener around Techie and upgraded frontline. Slam items aggressively and play for winstreak.
Level to 6 for more frontline: Bastions, Bruisers, Street Demons. If you have a few pairs, roll for upgrades.
Fast 8 and roll for Brand and at least 6 Techies. Ziggs is a good holder of Techie until Kobuko. Once stable, go 9 for 5 costs.

title: Tempo Techies

augmentsTip: Situational comp with Artifacts (B-tier without them). Fiddle has built in 20% Shred so Spark/Shiv is lower priority than usual. Position Fiddlesticks same side as enemy carry. Aim for 4 Boombot to cap the board.

tips.tip: Play around Bruiser opener. If you have Blighting Jewel, Morgana is the best early holder. Prioritize Fiddlesticks' AP items and econ.
Level for more frontline of whatever Techie you hit (Bastions, Bruisers, etc). Roll some on 6 if you have 3+ pairs.
Level to 7 and roll for Fiddle 2, Morde 2, and 6 Bruiser. Econ up and slow roll above 50g for Fiddle 3. After you finish 3*, level for Renekton / Kobuko.

title: Fiddlesticks Bruisers

augmentsTip: Strongest Cyberboss = # of items > last unit fielded on the board. Don't overgreed BIS on Veigar early and focus on winstreaking Stage 3. Viego and Renekton replaces the Street Demon Strategists for max cap.

tips.tip: Play around early Veigar with Blue Buff. Prioritize at least 2 Veigar items then slam whatever remaining tank on Poppy / frontline.
Level to 6 at 3-2 then roll for Veigar 2 and 4 Bastion. Econ and slow roll for 3* Veigar. If you have a reroll augment, you can chase 3* Bastion tank.
Once you finish Veigar 3, push levels. Play 6 Techie for cheap stats and push levels. Cap with Viego and Kobuko at 9.

title: Cyberboss Veigar

augmentsTip: Play Divinicorp emblem on Zed until you hit Garen. If you can't get Divinicorp mod, keep emblem on Zed and play other power 5 costs instead. Leftover AD Fighter on Renekton and Garen. Late game transition out of 4 Slayer into 5 costs.

tips.tip: Play a generic strong AD opener and slam items for tempo. Holding Morgana is not important so play or sell based on your econ.
Play high tempo around Slayers (Senna), Vanguards (Rhaast), or Bruisers (Gragas). Flex in extra Divinicorp when you have a free slot.
Fast 8 and look for Zed and as many Divinicorp units as you can. You can flex in 4 Slayer or other traits that support Zed. Go 9 for Renekton / 5 costs.

title: Divinicorp Zed

augmentsTip: Best with Flickerblade artifact opener. You can also primary carry Senna if you can 3* her. Primary tank is flexible: 3* Jarvan > 2* Leona. Leftover items on Zed.

tips.tip: Slam Rageblade early and play for tempo with Vayne + upgraded Vanguards. Anima Squad early is the ideal setup.
Level to 6 at 3-2 and roll for any upgrades with Vayne and your primary tank. Look for 4 Vanguard here. Winstreak rest of Stage 3 and econ up.
Level to 7 to roll for your 3*. Add in 4 Slayer. Roll for Vayne 3 > Jarvan 3, Zed > Senna 3. Add any Divinicorp or 5 cost on 8.

title: Slay Queens

augmentsTip: Button Mash Hero Augment mandatory. 4 Cyberboss very important. If you can make it to 9, look for 6 Bastion or add 5 costs like Garen and Viego. Can also play Nitro Poppy + Veigar variation.

tips.tip: Collect early copies of Poppy and econ up. Finish 3 items on Poppy ASAP. Nitro opener is quite solid here.
Slow roll for Poppy 3*. Flex around Bastions and Techies. If you are too far from Veigar, plan for Ziggs / Brand primary carry instead.
Look for Ziggs and Kobuko for 4 Cyberboss. Aim for 4-6 Bastion + 4 Cyberboss. Take combat augments to cement your board strength.

title: Button Mash Poppy

augmentsTip: Adaptive Strikes Hero Augment mandatory. Jax may need to be moved back to the second row in late game situations where he is getting burst down too quickly. Can also play 6 Bastion Jax with 3 Exotech.

tips.tip: Collect early copies of Jax and Exotech. Finish 3 items on Jax ASAP. Can play more Bastions early.
Slow roll for Jax 3* at level 5. Kindred 3 is luxury / not necessary. Have Jhin hold Zeri items.
Finish Jax 3 then level for 7 Exotech. Mordekaiser is a more reliable tank if Sejuani is too contested. Leftover AD on Jhin.

title: Adaptive Strikes Jax

augmentsTip: Cease and Desist Hero Augment mandatory. Just play cypher for the combat bonus, zed and draven also have good backline access so there's synergy with vi.

tips.tip: Collect early copies of Vi, Vanguards and econ up. If you have Cypher early, you can play for a small cash out.
Slow roll for Vi 3* and other Vanguards. If you are playing Cypher lose streak, consider cashing out 3-3 so you can start winning fights.
Push levels and add more Vanguards. Position Vi same side as enemy carry. Cap the board with a 5 cost.

title: Cease and Desist Vi

augmentsTip: Alter Ego Hero Augment mandatory. You can also play any variation of Vanguard Slayers or Divinicorp. Duo carry a 3* Slayer that you can reasonably hit: Senna 3 > Vayne 3 = Zed 2 > Senna 2 > Vayne 2. If Rhaast is dying too fast, position him 2nd row.

tips.tip: Pick the Hero Augment and begin collecting copies of Rhaast, Vayne, and supporting Divinicorp. Finish 3 items Rhaast ASAP
Level to 6 on 3-2 and roll until you have 2* Rhaast, 4 Vanguard, and preferably Vayne 2. Econ up and begin slow rolling on 6 for Rhaast 3.
If you have 7+ copies of Rhaast and very rich, you can level to 7 to roll for Rhaast 3 while looking for Senna / Zed. Always play Renekton on Senna.

title: Alter Ego Rhaast (Kayn)

augmentsTip: Chug Bug Hero Augment mandatory. Play this like the standard Morde and Fiddle Reroll with an extra carry. Fiddle has built in 20% Shred so Shiv / Spark is lower priority than usual. Position Fiddlesticks same side as Gragas and the enemy carry.

tips.tip: Play around Bruiser opener. Prioritize as many rods as possible we need to build 2 AP carries and econ up.
Level for Bruisers. Roll some on 6 if you have 3+ pairs and winstreaking. Otherwise, level to 7 on 3-5 and roll if low hp, or Level on 4-1 and roll.
Level to 7 and roll for Fiddle 2, Morde 2, Gragas 2, and 6 Bruiser. Econ up and slow roll above 50g for Fiddle 3 and Gragas 3. After you finish 3*, level for Renekton / Kobuko.

title: Chug Bug Gragas

augmentsTip: Wolf Unchained Hero Augment mandatory. Xayah takes leftover AD, Aurora takes leftover AP. Best Aurora bench units: Urgot, Zac, Kobuko > Sejuani, Leona

tips.tip: Collect early copies of Sylas, Anima Squad and econ up. Finish Sylas 3 items ASAP.
Slow roll for Sylas 3* and other Anima Squad. Make sure to activate Vanguard and don't get baited into playing 5 Anima Squad on level 5.
Finish your 3* and push levels for more Anima Squad. Last spot is flexible (Renekton, Garen are best).

title: Wolf Unchained Sylas

augmentsTip: AMP variation of tempo Nitro. Play when you have lots of tears / AP items with Nitro opener. Leftover AP on Yuumi, leftover AD on Samira.

tips.tip: Prioritize stacking your Nitro Robot ASAP . Prioritize Annie items. Focus on econ.
Keep nitro in and level to fill out your traits like Dynamo, Amp, and Bastion. Prioritize Annie items and hold them with Elise.
Go to level 8 and roll for Annie, Sejuani and hopefully Aurora. Ideally push 9 earlier to secure Aurora 2, Drop Kindred on 8. Zac/Garen on 9 is a Flex slot.

title: Nitro Annie

augmentsTip: Play when you have early Street Demons with AD items or powerful Artifacts for Rengar (listed in Alt Builds). Leftover AP on Brand. Can also chase Varus 3* over Vex if you have enough resources. Garen Executioner mod on Jinx is max cap.

tips.tip: Play around Graves and Golden Ox early to winstreak while making econ. Graves can hold both Rengar and Jinx items.
Level to 6 for Street Demons and relevant traits around your frontline. If you have Jinx 2 / Rengar 2, move items over.
Level to 7 to roll for Rengar 2 and Jinx 2 + 7 Street Demon. Econ back up and slow roll for 3* Rengar and Jinx.

title: Kitty Kitty Boom Boom

augmentsTip: Play when you have strong reroll augment or early scaling combat augment. Prioritize Elise items > Shyvana items > Leftover AD on MF / Leftover AP on Aurora. Can also chase Jhin 3 over Miss Fortune.

tips.tip: Prioritize getting Nitro in ASAP so you can get stacks every round. Prioritize Elise items and focus on econ.
Level to 6 on 3-2 and roll for at least Jhin 2 and Shyvana 2. Play 3 Exotech + 3 Nitro (ideally benching Nidalee).
Finish Jhin 3 / Elise 3 and any other Nitro you're close to hitting. Add 4 Nitro back in on 7. Level for more Dynamo late game.

title: DyNitro

augmentsTip: Prioritize Vex items > frontline items > Varus with leftover AP / Utility. Avoid if Exotech items are Pulse Stabilizer / Flux Capacitor. Cap with 5 costs: Aurora > Renekton on 9. Play Jhin + Jax until Viego + Renekton.

tips.tip: Either play from lose streak so you can guarantee BIS items or play a strong Exotech core for winstreak. Cypher cashout is strong for Vex too.
Level for more Exotech, Nitro, or whatever upgraded frontline (Bastions, Vanguards, etc). Econ up for level 8.
Fast 8 and look for Vex 2 and Sejuani 2. Aim for 5 Exotech in the mid-game (Jhin + Jax) until you hit Renekton and Viego. Once stable, go 9 for 5 costs.

title: Vexotech

augmentsTip: This is a Fast 9 comp oriented around Bruisers and Boombot Urgot. Rageblade is NOT BIS on Urgot, but it's important for early game winstreak tempo. Boombot does magic damage so full 30% Shred is nice to have. Boombot Garen mods cap the board.

tips.tip: Play around upgraded Kogmaw and frontline for winstreak. Likely around Vanguards and Skarner. If you have emblem, play the emblem on a damage dealer.
Level to 8 and stabilize around Cho'Gath, Bruisers, and an upgraded AD item holder for Urgot (example: Zeri, Aphelios). Don't roll too much and save for Fast 9.
Fast 9 and look to stabilize around a core of Urgot, Vex, Gragas, and Cho'Gath. Flex in 5 costs, Bruisers, or 6 Boombot. Itemize your 2* power units.

title: Boombot Urgot

augmentsTip: Not a Nitro comp. Play Nitro in the early game and drop it as we find more AMP and Strategists to make Naafiri as strong as possible. If your Exotech item is bad (no Pulse/Hyper Fangs), drop Sejuani and Jax for more Strategists too.

tips.tip: Angle comp with Naafiri opener. Prioritize Naafiri items. Pulse Stabilizer replaces Infinity Edge. Hyper Fangs replaces Omnivamp item.
Level to 6 on 3-2 and roll for at least Naafiri 2 and whatever nitro/AMP/Exotechs you upgrade. Slow roll above 50g for Naafiri 3, Yuumi 3 and to slowly replace your board with AMPS.
Finish Naafiri 3 and push levels for 5 Amp. Yuumi 3 / Annie 2 holds mana and AP items. Samira holds AD items.

title: AMP Naafiri

augmentsTip: Play when you have high likelihood of finding early Mundo 3 with good tank items. 3* Priority: Mundo 3 > Seraphine 3 > Zyra 3 = Alistar 3. Play items on Seraphine 3 / Zyra 3 until Brand 2. Positioning may change pending on the Street Demon hexes.

tips.tip: Collect early Mundo, Zyra, Seraphine, and Bruisers. Focus on Mundo items -> then leftover AP to the Techie you're likely to 3* first.
Stay level 5 and roll above 50g for  your 3* units. Play 3 Street Demon with either Bruisers or Techies.
Level for 4 Bruiser and 4 Techie. Add in 6 Techie + Viego to cap the board. Move carry items to Brand 2 once you hit.

title: Mundo Techies (Gorilla)

augmentsTip: Best on high item encounters + item augment start. You can check Team Planner to check Exotech items before you commit to an augment. 5 costs cap the board the best: Aurora > Viego > Garen/Zac/Kobuko

tips.tip: Ideally take item augments early to finish 3 item quickly and get Exotech value. Play around early Jhin and Exotech.
Level for 5 Exotech and Bastions. You should have full 3 items on a frontline and a backline unit. Econ up for Fast 8.
Fast 8 @ 4-2 and look for Zeri, Sejuani, and at least 5 Exotech. Can flex in other units (Renekton + Shyvana, Aurora + Kobuko, etc). Go 9 for 5 costs.

title: Bullet Time

augmentsTip: Play when you have Rapidfire Emblem. Ideally also play from Cypher cashout so you have enough resources to hit Renekton. Can also play for Draven 3 / Galio 3.  Avoid building Rageblade in this comp because you already have so much attack speed.

tips.tip: Play for lose streak Cypher or best winstreak board. Early game Rapidfire often want Rageblade, but we don't want it for this comp so play other AD openers instead.
If you're playing Cypher, maintain lose streak and cash out at 3-7. If you're winstreaking, prioritize upgraded frontline. Take any frontline-oriented augments.
Level to 8 and stabilize around Zeri 2 and 4 or 6 Rapidfire. Once you find Renekton, transition to 6 Rapidfire. Give leftover AD to Zeri and Draven.

title: Long Crocodile

augmentsTip: Prioritize Vex items > frontline items > Varus with leftover AP / Utility. Hyperfangs and Chassis are the best Exotech items to play. 3rd item on Vex is flexible: Guardbreaker > Deathcap > Giant Slayer.

tips.tip: Either play from lose streak so you can guarantee BIS items or play a strong Exotech core for winstreak. Cypher cashout is strong for Vex too.
Level for more Exotech, Nitro, or whatever upgraded frontline (Bastions, Vanguards, etc). Econ up for level 8.
Fast 8 and look for Vex 2 and Chogath 2. If you hit early Urgot with items you can play it over exotech. Once stable, go 9 for 5 costs. Can drop varus and Jhin for Aurora Viego.

title: Vex Bruisers

augmentsTip: Play with Divinicorp Emblem and strong likelihood to get to level 9 for 5 costs. You can replace Cho'Gath and Jarvan for other units like Sejuani, Zac, Garen, and Kobuko. Can also take out weaker Divinicorp like Senna and Rhaast for more value. Leftover items on Urgot and Renekton.

tips.tip: Either play from lose streak so you can guarantee BIS items or play a strong Exotech core for winstreak. Cypher cashout is strong for Vex too.
Level for more Divinicorp, Nitro, or whatever upgraded frontline (Bastions, Vanguards, etc). Econ up for level 8.
Fast 8 and look for Vex 2 and Chogath 2. Aim for 4 Bruiser in the midgame before Renekton/Urgot. Once stable, go 9 for 5 costs.

title: DiviniVex

augmentsTip: Situational setup around Scoped Weapons Augment. Shaco is a snowball carry so only play from spots you are very likely to hit quickly. Shaco does not stack permanent AD on PvE rounds. Do NOT make the Kingping (hat Braum instead).

tips.tip: Focus on getting permanent AD stacks on Shaco. Slam items aggressively. You likely won't lose streak fully but it's okay if you gain stacks.
If you are close to Shaco (6+ copies), hyper roll at Stage 3-1 / Level 4 for Shaco 3. Otherwise, slow roll boave 50g for Shaco.
Push levels for Slayers. Zed / Senna takes leftover AD items. Cap the board with Renekton or Garen.

title: Shaco-ped Weapons

augmentsTip: Can also play Jhin when tank Exotech item is good. On level 8 you can play 4 Dynamo 4 Bastion if you don't have Renekton. Play anti-heal on Morgana until you hit Elise / Aurora. Always place Galio and Sejunani on the edges same side as enemy carry.

tips.tip: Collect early Morgana and Bastions. If you have Morgana 2 with Bluebuff, you can play for winstreak. Don't use any gold for leveling.
Roll above 50g for 3* Morgana and Poppy. Aim for 4 Bastion and 2 Dynamo. Once you finish 3* Morgana, if you're too far from Poppy 3*, push levels.
Level 7, add a 3rd Dynamo. Level 8, go for 6 Bastion / 2 Dynamo or 4 Bastion / 4 Dynamo. Cap the board with Aurora and Renekton.

title: Bastion Morgana

augmentsTip: Frontline is flexible. Play around Braum and Syndicate until you hit 5 costs. Can also play 4 Vanguards (Leona), Bruisers (Cho'Gath), or Exotech (Sejuani + Jhin). Drop Syndicate late game for the 5 costs. If you don't have Elise 3, swap items with Aurora 2 late game.

tips.tip: Play a strong winstreak opener slamming all items, preferably around Morgana, Elise, and Dynamo. Jhin holds MF items.
Level to 6 and maintain winstreak. Roll if you have 3+ impactful pairs. Add more frontline to stall for your Morgana and Dynamos.
Econ up then go to level 8 and roll for 4 Dynamo and whatever upgraded frontline you can hit. Go 9 for Aurora and 5 costs.

title: Dynamo Flex

augmentsTip: Only play this with heavy econ/resources. A big Cypher cashout isn't required (can take ~100 if it's econ related). If you take small cashout, then play for winstreak Stage 2 & 3. Rolling at 7 over 6 is preferred to find Galio 3 and 1 Zed.

tips.tip: If you start with Cypher, focus on lose streaking while making econ. Otherwise, play best board and winstreak.
If you got cypher stage 2 continue to lose streak and aim to cash out on wolves. If you get cypher late (3-1/3-2) roll on 6 for leblanc 2, vi 2 and galio/draven and cash out on 3-3 for tempo.
Regardless of cashout, level to 7 on 4-1 or 4-2 and dig for 1 Zed and Leblanc/Galio/Draven Copies. After you hit zed, slowroll for all the cyphers.

title: 5 Cypher Reroll

augmentsTip: Great with a wide variety of artifacts (almost always keep SG + QS). Play Aphelios / Annie for 4 Golden Ox until you hit Viego. Cap the board with Renekton or another 5 cost.

tips.tip: Slam items aggressively and play around Graves as the primary item holder. The first interval for Golden Ox that is clean is 2-5 double level to 5.
Roll down on level 6 / Stage 3-2 for Graves 2 and 2* Bruisers / Vanguards. Roll every turn to trigger Golden Ox unless you are too poor. Play 4 Golden Ox if you hit.
Finish your 3* then level for Divinicorp units. For max cap, go 9 and take out Alistar / cheap Divinicorp for 5 costs. Keep triggering Golden Ox every turn possible.

title: Golden Graves

augmentsTip: Vanguard emblem not necessary. Play any upgraded 6th Vanguard until you find Garen. Mods: Vanguard Garen > Golden Ox Xayah > Anima Squad Aphelios > Vanguard Backline. Positioning shown is anti-Sejuani stun.

tips.tip: Play a strong tempo opener around Rageblade and Vanguard opener while econning up.
Level for 4 Vanguard + any backline duo carry that can play Rageblade. 2 Slayers (Vayne), 2 Marksman (Jhin/Jinx), or 2 Rapidfire (TF).
Fast 8 and look for Aphelios, Xayah, and 6 Vanguard. Jinx 2 can hold items temporarily if you are struggling to upgrade your 4 costs.

title: 6 Vanguard Marksman

augmentsTip: This is a Fast 9 comp oriented around Vanguards and abusing Garen mods. Rageblade is NOT that good on Urgot, but it's strong for early game to winstreak Fast 9. Boombot does magic damage so full 30% Shred is nice to have.

tips.tip: Play around upgraded Kogmaw and Vanguard for winstreak. Slam items aggressively and play for winstreak.
Level to 8 and stabilize around 6 Vanguard with an AD carry backline that can hold these items (Aphelios, Xayah, Zeri). Don't roll too much and save for Fast 9.
Fast 9 and look to stabilize around a core of Urgot and 6 Vanguard. Flex in Vex, 4-cost AD backline, and 5 costs (Garen > Aurora/Zac).

title: Vanguard Urgot
